translation.text:
Major Delays continue to be experienced on the Bankstown Line due to signal equipment repairs caused by severe weather conditions.

Train stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.

Please allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements, check transport apps and information screens before boarding your service.
Airport & South Line, Inner West & Leppington Line - Delays

Please allow up to 25 minutes additional travel time due to signal equipment repairs caused by severe weather conditions on the Bankstown Line. Please listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps as some stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.

Trains have been suspended due to a tree caught in the overhead wiring between Blaxland and Glenbrook 
Buses are replacing trains between Penrith and Springwood. 
Some T1 Western Line & Blue Mountains Line services may finish at / start from St Marys to reduce congestion towards Penrith. If you wish to continue your journey towards Penrith, please board any Penrith service to complete your journey.  

Train stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice. Please continue to allow plenty of additional travel time, listen for announcements and check information screens before boarding trains.

Alternatively, delay or avoid non-essential travel or make alternative arrangements.

A-League: Central Coast Mariners v Macarthur FC
18:00- 21:00
The closest station to Central Coast Stadium is Gosford on the Central Coast & Newcastle Line. The stadium is a short walk from Gosford Station via Showground Road and Dane Drive.

For more info visit: transportnsw.info/events/2021/03/league-central-coast-mariners-v-macarthur-fc#homepage

Penrith due to a tree caught in the overhead wiring at Blaxland. 

Limited buses are now on site and are replacing trains between Penrith and Springwood. Please change at Penrith to complete your journey.

Please allow additional travel time.

Springwood due to a tree caught in the overhead wiring at Blaxland. 

Limited buses are now on site and are replacing trains between Springwood and Penrith. 

Please allow additional travel time.

Kingsgrove due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions.
This service will not be travelling via the City Circle due to signal equipment repairs on the Bankstown Line.
Kingsgrove due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions.
The first carriage is unavailable. Please board one of the other carriages of this service.
Gordon due to a tree caught in the overhead wiring at Blaxland.
due to signal equipment repairs on the Bankstown Line.
The lift between the concourse and street level is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4349 9230
The lift between the concourse and Victoria Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 02 4962 9240.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1 & 2 is temporarily out of service. For any assistance, please ask staff or call 6354 9507.

From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 to 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 to 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Platforms 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works. A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
